Author: vitaminsplz
Text: So sorry to hear that you can't have those foods! It's a real bummer when like. The only foods you're actually okay with aren't tolerable for your body. But at least you're not feeling like garabge all the time anymore, eh?  The same thing is going to happen with me soon because my doctors want to do this FODMAP diet with me, and then eventually a 6 food elimination diet. So no more mushrooms or cauliflower or nuts or etc etc for me either
